effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

short_effect.black_white: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.

flavor_text.black_white: The user hits the target with its tail. It may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user hits the target with its tail. It may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
